discussion_comments.comment_body: Yes. I will updated with a title. Thank you.

We might want a more generic title (e.g. leaving off the 780m) since this document could be expanded to include other AMD iGPUs. The new Ryzen 9 HX 375 will probably get good performance so will probably be added, but there'd be little reasons to add an additional file when it could be appended to this.

commented_code:
The official [Ollama Docker image `ollama/ollama`](https://hub.docker.com/r/ollama/ollama)
 is available on Docker Hub.
 
+### Autocompletion
+To enable autocompletion generate completion script for your shell (`bash`, `zsh`, `fish`) and `source` it in your shell config (`~/.bash_profile`, `~/.zshrc`, `~/.profile`, `~/.bashrc`, etc.):
+```
+echo "source <(./ollama completion bash)" >> ~/.bashrc # Required bash-completion package installed

discussion_comments.comment_body:
You have instructions for bash, but not zsh and fish. I knew what to do, but it might be helpful for others.

I ran 

`‚ùØ ollama completion fish > ~/.config/fish/completions/ollama.fish`
